DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize vytorin may improve vascular insulin resistance hypercholesterolemic patient
DOC.criteria: hypercholesterolemia overt liver disease , chronic renal failure , hypothyroidism , myopathy , uncontrolled diabetes ( HbA1c > 9 % ) , severe hypertension , stroke , acute coronary event , coronary revascularization within precede 3 month , alcohol abuse
